short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser action icon that joins every active tab URL into a single string and copy to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy all the URL's of your tabs with this extension. Tabs to Clipboard allows you to select different styles to your resulting URL list, customize separation, quote wrapping and URL's with current titles.
